argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumzsubmcl.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumzsubmcl.z | |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumzsubmcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumzsubmcl.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 5 |  | gsumzsubmcl.s | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 6 |  | gsumzsubmcl.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) |
| 7 |  | gsumzsubmcl.c | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) |
| 8 |  | gsumzsubmcl.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( 0g ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( Cntz ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G |`s S ) = ( G |`s S ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_submmnd | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 14 | 5, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( G |`s S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 15 | 12 | #P_submbas | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_feq3d | |- ( ph -> ( F : A --> S <-> F : A --> ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 6, 17 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> F : A --> ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_frn | |- ( F : A --> S -> ran F C_ S ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ S ) |
| 21 | 7, 20 | #P_ssind | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Z ` ran F ) i^i S ) ) |
| 22 | 12, 2, 11 | #P_resscntz | |- ( ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ ran F C_ S ) -> ( ( Cntz ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` ran F ) = ( ( Z ` ran F ) i^i S ) ) |
| 23 | 5, 20, 22 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( Cntz ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` ran F ) = ( ( Z ` ran F ) i^i S ) ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_sseqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 25 | 12, 1 | #P_subm0 | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> .0. = ( 0g ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 26 | 5, 25 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 27 | 8, 26 | #P_breqtrd | |- ( ph -> F finSupp ( 0g ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 28 | 9, 10, 11, 14, 4, 18, 24, 27 | #P_gsumzcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( G |`s S ) gsum F ) e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 29 | 4, 5, 6, 12 | #P_gsumsubm | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( ( G |`s S ) gsum F ) ) |
| 30 | 28, 29, 16 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) |
